about.title: About
about.subtitle: A bit about me
about.description:
I'm Eduardo, a Full Stack Developer passionate about turning ideas into real products. With strong experience in the JavaScript ecosystem (React, Next.js, Node.js) and Mobile (Kotlin, Flutter), I combine strategic business vision with robust system architecture.

My experience includes technical leadership and Product Engineering, working from complex integrations with Spring Boot to high-performance interfaces. My focus is to unite clean and scalable code with real value delivery, whether as a Tech Lead or developer.
